about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Get to know GoldenWing
about.heroDescription: A creative agency based in Vienna that helps businesses succeed digitally. From brand development to technical implementation ‚Äì everything from one source.
about.heroSecondary: Founded from the conviction that outstanding design and strategic thinking belong together. We combine creativity with data, aesthetics with performance.

about.visionDescription: A world where every business ‚Äì regardless of its size ‚Äì has access to first-class design and digital strategy. We want to be the first choice for businesses that want more than standard and are ready to shape their industry.

frequency.question: How often will I receive newsletters?
frequency.answer: We send a maximum of one newsletter per week. Quality over quantity.

unsubscribe.question: Can I unsubscribe at any time?
unsubscribe.answer: Yes, every newsletter contains an unsubscribe link. One click is enough.

data.question: What happens to my data?
data.answer: Your data is only used for sending newsletters and is not shared with third parties.

cost.question: Is the newsletter really free?
cost.answer: Yes, our newsletter is and will remain free. No hidden costs.

home.title: GoldenWing Creative Studios | Branding & Web Design Agency Vienna ¬∑ Dubai ¬∑ California
home.description: International creative agency with offices in Vienna ¬∑ Dubai ¬∑ California. Branding, web design, SEO & software development. Schedule your free consultation!

locations.title: Our Locations
locations.subtitle: International Presence ‚Äì Local Expertise
locations.description: With offices in Vienna, Dubai, and California, we provide world-class creative solutions to clients worldwide. Each location combines local know-how with international standards.

vienna.title: Vienna
vienna.subtitle: Our Headquarters in the Heart of Europe
vienna.heroDescription: Our headquarters in Vienna is the creative hub of GoldenWing. Here we develop brand strategies, design websites, and implement digital projects for clients across Austria and Europe.
vienna.description: From Vienna, we serve clients in Austria, Germany, and the entire DACH region. Our team combines Viennese creativity with international experience.
vienna.specialties: Branding, Web Design, SEO, Software Development

dubai.title: Dubai
dubai.subtitle: Creative Solutions for the Middle East
dubai.heroDescription: Our Dubai office combines European design expertise with the dynamic Middle Eastern market. We help businesses succeed in the region.
dubai.description: Located in the Business Bay district, we serve clients in the UAE, Saudi Arabia, and the entire MENA region.
dubai.address: DAMAC Executive Bay Tower B, Office 1406, Dubai

roseville.title: California
roseville.subtitle: Creative Agency in the Heart of California
roseville.heroDescription: Our US office in Roseville, California, brings European design expertise to the American market. We help businesses strengthen their digital presence.
roseville.description: Located in the greater Sacramento area, we serve clients on the West Coast and throughout the USA.

remote.question: Can we work together remotely?
remote.answer: Yes! We successfully collaborate with clients worldwide. Thanks to modern communication tools, remote collaboration works seamlessly.

meetings.question: Are in-person meetings possible?
meetings.answer: Absolutely. We welcome in-person meetings at our offices or at your location.

timezone.question: How does communication work across time zones?
timezone.answer: We're flexible and adapt to your working hours. Our global presence enables quick response times.

webdesign.title: Web Design Agency Vienna | Professional Websites
webdesign.subtitle: Professional Websites for Your Success
webdesign.heroDescription: We create modern, responsive websites that perfectly showcase your brand and convert visitors into customers. From concept to launch ‚Äì everything from one source.
webdesign.whyUsDescription: We combine creative design with technical excellence. Every website is individually developed for your target audience and business goals.
webdesign.pricingDescription: Transparent pricing for professional web design

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: Perfect for small businesses and startups
starter.features: One-Page Website, Responsive Design, Contact Form, Basic SEO, 1 Year Hosting

business.name: Business
business.description: For growing companies with multiple services
business.features: Up to 10 Pages, CMS Integration, Blog Function, Advanced SEO, Analytics Setup

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.features: Unlimited Pages, E-Commerce Integration, Custom Features, Multi-Language, Premium Support

cost.question: How much does a professional website cost?
cost.answer: Professional web design starts at ‚Ç¨2,000 for simple websites. Business websites with CMS cost ‚Ç¨5,000-8,000. The exact cost depends on the project scope.

duration.question: How long does it take to create a website?
duration.answer: A simple website takes 2-4 weeks. Business websites with CMS need 4-8 weeks. Complex e-commerce projects can take 8-12 weeks.

cms.question: Can I edit my website myself?
cms.answer: Yes! Our Business and Enterprise packages include a user-friendly CMS. After a brief training, you can update content independently.

mobile.question: Is the website optimized for mobile devices?
mobile.answer: Yes, all our websites are 100% responsive and mobile-first developed.

seo.title: SEO Agency Vienna | Search Optimization
seo.subtitle: More Visibility, More Customers
seo.heroDescription: We bring your website to the top of Google search results. With data-driven SEO strategy, technical optimization, and high-quality content, we sustainably increase your organic reach.
seo.whyUsDescription: We rely on white-hat SEO methods for sustainable success. No short-term tricks, but long-term strategies that work.
seo.servicesDescription: Comprehensive search engine optimization for sustainable results

audit.name: SEO Audit
audit.features: Technical Analysis, Content Evaluation, Backlink Analysis, Competitor Analysis, Recommendations

starter.name: SEO Starter
starter.description: For small websites and local businesses
starter.features: Keyword Research, On-Page Optimization, Google Business Profile, Monthly Reporting

business.name: SEO Business
business.features: All Starter Features, Content Creation, Link Building, Technical SEO, Weekly Updates

duration.question: How long until SEO shows results?
duration.answer: SEO is a long-term strategy. You'll often see first improvements after 3-6 months. Significant results are typically achieved after 6-12 months.

guarantee.question: Do you guarantee specific rankings?
guarantee.answer: Reputable SEO agencies cannot guarantee specific rankings ‚Äì Google decides the placement. What we guarantee: professional work and measurable improvements.

local.question: What is Local SEO?
local.answer: Local SEO focuses on local search queries and optimizes your Google Business Profile, local directories, and location-based keywords. Ideal for businesses with a local catchment area.

creative.title: Creative Agency Vienna | Design & Branding
creative.subtitle: Creative Solutions That Work
creative.heroDescription: As a full-service creative agency in Vienna, we offer everything to make your brand shine: From branding to web design to digital marketing strategies.
creative.whyUsDescription: We're more than an agency ‚Äì we're your creative partner. With passion, expertise, and an eye for detail, we develop solutions that move your business forward.
creative.servicesDescription: Everything from one source ‚Äì from strategy to implementation
creative.approachDescription: We listen, understand your challenges, and develop tailored solutions. No project is like another ‚Äì and that's exactly how we treat it.

serviceDescriptions.branding: Brand strategy, logo design and corporate identity for an unforgettable brand presence.
serviceDescriptions.webdesign: Modern, responsive websites that perfectly present your brand and convert visitors.
serviceDescriptions.seo: Better rankings in Google and more organic traffic through professional SEO optimization.
serviceDescriptions.strategy: Target audience analysis, competitive analysis and strategic positioning for your success.
serviceDescriptions.content: Professional content creation, photography and social media content.
serviceDescriptions.software: Web apps, mobile apps and custom software solutions for your business.

services.question: What services does GoldenWing offer?
services.answer: We offer branding, web design, SEO, content creation, software development, and digital strategy ‚Äì all from one source.

process.question: How does collaboration work?
process.answer: After a free initial consultation, we create a proposal. Upon commissioning, we start with a kickoff, followed by concept, design, development, and launch.

remote.question: Do you work with clients outside Vienna?
remote.answer: Yes! With offices in Vienna, Dubai, and California, we work with clients worldwide.

faqPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqPage.subtitle: Answers to the most important questions about our services, pricing, and working with GoldenWing.

webCost.question: How much does a professional website cost?
webCost.answer: Professional web design starts at ‚Ç¨2,000 for simple websites. Business websites with CMS cost ‚Ç¨5,000-8,000. Complex e-commerce solutions range from ‚Ç¨10,000-20,000+.

webDuration.question: How long does it take to create a website?
webDuration.answer: A simple website takes 2-4 weeks. Business websites with CMS need 4-8 weeks. Complex e-commerce projects can take 8-12 weeks.

webCms.question: Can I edit my website myself?
webCms.answer: Yes! Our Business and Enterprise packages include a user-friendly CMS.

webMobile.question: Is the website optimized for mobile devices?
webMobile.answer: Yes, all our websites are 100% responsive and mobile-first developed.

webTech.question: What technologies do you use?
webTech.answer: We use modern technologies like Next.js, React, and TypeScript. For CMS, we offer WordPress and Payload CMS.

webHosting.question: Do you also offer hosting and maintenance?
webHosting.answer: Yes, we offer complete hosting packages and ongoing maintenance. Hosting is included in the first year with most packages.

brandingPackage.question: What does a branding package include?
brandingPackage.answer: A complete branding package includes: brand strategy, logo design with variants, color palette and typography, brand guidelines, and business stationery.

brandingDuration.question: How long does it take to develop a brand identity?
brandingDuration.answer: A professional branding project typically takes 4-8 weeks.

logoCost.question: How much does logo design cost?
logoCost.answer: Professional logo design starts at ‚Ç¨1,500. Complete branding packages with guidelines start at ‚Ç¨3,500.

brandingFiles.question: Do I receive the files in all formats?
brandingFiles.answer: Yes, you receive all files in various formats (AI, EPS, PDF, SVG, PNG, JPG) for print and digital use.

seoDuration.question: How long until SEO shows results?
seoDuration.answer: You'll often see first improvements after 3-6 months. Significant results are achieved after 6-12 months.

seoCost.question: How much does SEO cost?
seoCost.answer: Our SEO packages start at ‚Ç¨790/month. A one-time SEO audit costs ‚Ç¨490.

seoGuarantee.question: Do you guarantee specific rankings?
seoGuarantee.answer: Reputable SEO agencies cannot guarantee specific rankings. What we guarantee: professional work and measurable improvements.

seoAds.question: Do I need SEO if I already run Google Ads?
seoAds.answer: Yes! SEO and SEA complement each other perfectly. SEO brings sustainable, free traffic, while Google Ads delivers quick results.

localSeo.question: What is Local SEO?
localSeo.answer: Local SEO focuses on local search queries and optimizes your Google Business Profile and local directories.

processOverview.question: How does collaboration work?
processOverview.answer: After a free initial consultation, we create a proposal. Upon commissioning, we start with kickoff, concept, design, development, and testing.

singleService.question: Can I book individual services?
singleService.answer: Yes, you can book both individual services and complete packages.

remote.question: Do you work with clients outside Vienna?
remote.answer: Yes! With offices in Vienna, Dubai, and California, we work with clients worldwide.

communication.question: How do we communicate during the project?
communication.answer: Via email, phone, video calls, or in-person meetings, depending on your preference. You have a dedicated contact person.

afterLaunch.question: What happens after the project launch?
afterLaunch.answer: After launch, we offer support packages for maintenance and further development. We fix bugs free of charge in the first month.

payment.question: What are your payment terms?
payment.answer: For projects over ‚Ç¨2,000: 50% upon commissioning, 50% upon completion.

hiddenCosts.question: Are there hidden costs?
hiddenCosts.answer: No. Our proposal contains all discussed services transparently itemized.

installments.question: Do you offer payment plans?
installments.answer: For larger projects, we can arrange flexible payment models.

notSatisfied.question: What if I'm not satisfied with the result?
notSatisfied.answer: We work iteratively with feedback loops. If you're unsatisfied, we find a solution together.

faqPage.stillQuestionsDescription: We're happy to answer all your questions in a personal conversation.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.metaDescription: Privacy policy of GOLDENWING Creative Studios e.U. according to GDPR. Information about data processing and your rights.
privacy.keywords: Privacy, GDPR, Privacy Policy, Data Protection

responsible.title: 1. Data Controller
responsible.intro: The controller responsible for data processing on this website is:

dataCollection.title: 2. Collection and Storage of Personal Data

contactForm.title: 2.1 Contact Form
contactForm.intro: When you contact us via the contact form, the following data is collected:
contactForm.legal: This data is used exclusively for processing your inquiry and is not shared with third parties. The legal basis is Art. 6 (1) lit. b GDPR (contract initiation).

serverLogs.title: 2.2 Server Log Files
serverLogs.intro: Each time you access our website, the following data is automatically collected:

items.ip: IP address of the requesting computer
items.file: Name and URL of the retrieved file
items.referrer: Website from which access was made (referrer URL)

serverLogs.retention: This data is required for technical reasons and is automatically deleted after 30 days.

cookies.title: 3. Cookies
cookies.intro: This website uses cookies to improve the user experience. Cookies are small text files stored on your device.
cookies.types: We use the following types of cookies:

necessary.label: Essential cookies
necessary.description: These are required for the basic functions of the website and cannot be disabled.

analytics.label: Analytics cookies
analytics.description: These help us understand how visitors interact with the website (only with your consent).

rights.title: 4. Your Rights
rights.intro: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:

access.label: Right of access (Art. 15 GDPR)
access.description: You can request information about your processed data.

rectification.label: Right to rectification (Art. 16 GDPR)
rectification.description: You can request correction of inaccurate data.

erasure.label: Right to erasure (Art. 17 GDPR)
erasure.description: You can request deletion of your data.

restriction.label: Right to restriction of processing (Art. 18 GDPR)
restriction.description: You can request restriction of processing.

portability.label: Right to data portability (Art. 20 GDPR)
portability.description: You can receive your data in a common format.

thirdCountry.title: 5. Data Transfer to Third Countries
thirdCountry.content: We use services that may transfer data to third countries (e.g., USA). For such transfers, we ensure that appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your data (e.g., EU Standard Contractual Clauses).

storage.title: 6. Storage Duration
storage.content: We store your personal data only as long as necessary for the purposes for which it was collected or as required by law.

complaint.title: 7. Right to Complain
complaint.intro: You have the right to lodge a complaint with the competent data protection authority:

contact.title: 8. Contact
contact.intro: If you have any questions about data protection, you can contact us at any time:

exitPopup.title: Wait! Free SEO Audit
exitPopup.subtitle: Before you leave ‚Äì get a free analysis of your website.

exitPopup.privacyText: By submitting, you agree to our

content.title: Liability for Content
content.text: The contents of our pages were created with the greatest care. However, we cannot guarantee the accuracy, completeness, and timeliness of the content. As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages according to general laws pursuant to ¬ß 7 (1) ECG.

links.title: Liability for Links
links.text: Our offer contains links to external websites of third parties, over whose content we have no influence. Therefore, we cannot assume any liability for these external contents. The respective provider or operator of the pages is always responsible for the contents of the linked pages.

copyright.title: Copyright
copyright.content: The content and works created by the site operators on these pages are subject to Austrian copyright law. Reproduction, processing, distribution, and any kind of exploitation outside the limits of copyright require the written consent of the respective author or creator. Downloads and copies of this site are only permitted for private, non-commercial use.

dispute.note: We are not willing or obliged to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.
